description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in realmag777 WOLF – WordPress Posts Bulk Editor and Manager Professional allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects WOLF – WordPress Posts Bulk Editor and Manager Professional: from n/a through 1.0.8.
